Holy Text.name: 教典（Holy Text）
Holy Text.description: 教典 这是一本特定宗教的教义，有标题、经文、和该信仰特有仪式的详细说明。较便宜的教典是一种体积小而重量轻的书，没有插图，印刷或抄写在薄纸上，封面以帆布或薄皮革制成。标准的教典常被冒险经验丰富的牧师所持有，它由高质量的纸张制成，坚固耐用，还有皮革制的封面和章节插图，其价格为25 gp，重量为2磅。最昂贵的版本有详细的插图，镀金的首字母和边框装饰，封面由精致的皮革，木材甚至是金属制成，这种教典通常过大并且难以随身携带。 价格 1-100 gp; 重量 1-20 磅

Holy water.name: 圣水（Holy Water）
Holy water.description:
价格：25G；重量：1磅

  圣水可以对不死生物和邪恶异界生物造成伤害，就像酸造成伤害那样。你可以将一瓶圣水投掷出去作为溅射武器使用。这类攻击被视为射程为10的远程接触攻击。瓶子如果掷到有实体的生物身上会破裂开，但是对付那些无实体的生物，你必须打开瓶子，将圣水泼到它们身上。因此，只有在虚体生物和你毗邻时你才能用圣水泼到它。该动作为远程的接触动作，它不会引发藉机攻击。直接命中不死生物和邪恶异界生物会造成2d4点的伤害。在5尺之内的该类生物都会由于圣水的飞溅而受到1点伤害。善良神诋的教堂会以成本价出售圣水（没有任何盈利）。圣水由相应的法术祝福圣水 制作。

Hook, Grappling (Common).name: 爪钩 (普通)（Hook, Grappling (Common)）
Hook, Grappling (Common).description:
Type 价格 重量
普通 1 gp 4 磅
秘银 2,001 gp 2 磅

  投掷爪钩需要进行一个远程攻击检定，爪钩视为射程增量为10尺的投掷武器。有足够位置以让爪钩固定住的物体的AC为5。

Horn, signal.name: Horn, signal（Horn, signal）
Horn, signal.description:
Horn, signal

Source PZO1115

  Sounding a horn requires a DC 10 Perform (wind instruments) check and can convey concepts such as "Attack!", "Help!", "Advance!", "Retreat!", "Fire!", and, "Alarm!" The report of a signal horn can be clearly heard (Perception DC 0) up to a half-mile distant. For each quarter-mile beyond, Perception checks to hear the horn suffer a -1 penalty.

Hound's Blood.name: Hound's Blood（Hound's Blood）
Hound's Blood.description:
Source PZO1121

  If you apply the thick, red paste known as hound's blood to your nostrils or upper lip, it greatly enhances your sense of smell. For most creatures, this grants a +2 alchemical bonus on Perception checks for 1 hour. For gnomes, it briefly grants a super-heightened sense of smell, granting the scent ability for 5 minutes, before the potency is reduced to a +2 alchemical bonus on Perception checks for an additional 1 hour.

Hourglass.name: 沙漏（Hourglass）
Hourglass.description:
Type 价格 重量
1 小时 25 gp 1 磅
1 分钟 20 gp 1/2 磅
6 秒 10 gp –

  标准的沙漏的沙子从上端的玻璃球内完全流到下方需要1小时时间；小号的沙漏能更精确地标记时间，型号也有更多选择：1分钟和6秒钟两种。计时超过1小时的沙漏非常罕见。

Howdah.name: Howdah（Howdah）
Howdah.description:
Source PCS:Orcs

  This wooden platform is tied like a saddle to a Huge creature's back. The platform is 10 feet square and enclosed by a low wall and sometimes a roof. The howdah has room for four Medium creatures (usually armed with bows or longspears), or two Medium creatures and a light ballista or light catapult. Occupants of the howdah have cover against attackers from below and are considered mounted for the purposes of making attacks.

Ifrit's Blood.name: Ifrit's Blood（Ifrit's Blood）
Ifrit's Blood.description:
Source PZO1121

  Ifrit alchemists claim to make this thick red oil from their own blood-hence the morbid name-but this claim is almost certainly false. Ifrit's blood ignites upon contact with air, but burns slowly and is unsuitable for use as a splash weapon. A creature can apply a flask of ifrit's blood to a weapon as a standard action, wreathing the weapon in vibrant red flames for 1 minute. The oil deals 1 point of fire damage on each successful attack with the weapon and deals 1 point of fire damage to the weapon itself, bypassing the weapon's hardness if any part of it is made of wood. If the oil is applied to a creature's natural weapons or unarmed strikes, the creature takes 1 point of fire damage each round (though its fire immunity or resistance still applies).

Improving Skill Checks.name: Improving Skill Checks（Improving Skill Checks）
Improving Skill Checks.description: Each dungeon guide can grant bonuses on up to three very specific skill checks both in and out of the dungeon. A PC who has ranks in the guide's associated skill can attempt a check with that skill while using the guide, which takes 1 minute. If she succeeds, she gains a circumstance bonus on one of the guide's listed skill checks (the amount of the bonus is listed with each skill), which the PC must make within 10 minutes. Failure indicates that the guide doesn't include helpful details pertaining to that specific check or that the PC was unable to understand the guide well enough to gain a bonus from it at that time. A PC cannot try again to improve a skill check, though she can attempt to gain the skill bonus on a different check. For example, a PC who fails to gain a bonus from her dungeon guide on dismantling a wooden trap may try to improve a later check with a different wooden trap. A PC cannot gain more than one bonus from a dungeon guide at a time.

Incendiary Catalyst.name: Incendiary Catalyst（Incendiary Catalyst）
Incendiary Catalyst.description:
Source PZO90115

  价格 40 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Incendiary catalyst can be thrown at a creature as a ranged touch attack with a range increment of 10 feet. On a hit, the target is doused with accelerants that give the target vulnerability to fire for 1 round. Incendiary catalyst does not affect creatures that are already vulnerable to fire, and the target's fire immunity and resistances apply as normal. Crafting this item requires a successful DC 20 Craft (alchemy) check.

Incense.name: Incense（Incense）
Incense.description:
Source PZO1121

  This aromatic resin, imbued with fragrant oils, is often formed into sticks, cones, or balls and burned in ceremonies or during meditation. A piece of incense burns for 1 hour.

Incense (10 sticks).name: Incense (10 sticks)（Incense (10 sticks)）
Incense (10 sticks).description:
Source Advanced Race Guide pg. 87
价格 10 gp; 重量 1 磅
分类 冒险装备

描述

  This aromatic resin, imbued with fragrant oils, is often formed into sticks, cones, or balls and burned in ceremonies or during meditation. A piece of incense burns for 1 hour.

Incense, Scentbane.name: Incense, Scentbane（Incense, Scentbane）
Incense, Scentbane.description:
Source PZO1121

  Scentbane incense is a form of smokestick that also blocks most scents. As long as the smoke lasts, creatures with the scent special ability must make Perception checks, opposed by the Stealth checks of any creatures within the smoke, to use scent to locate creatures within the smoke. If a creature remains in scentbane incense for 5 rounds or more, the smoke clings to it for 1 round after it leaves, making it similarly difficult to find by scent during that time.

Incubation Stove.name: Incubation Stove（Incubation Stove）
Incubation Stove.description:
Source PCh:DDR

  Designed by dwarves, this iron pot-bellied stove is about the size of a halfling. It burns wood, coal, dung, or fungus stalks, and has a large moveable compartment on the outside to hold maturing owlbear eggs. The stoves need constant attention to maintain the right temperature, else the eggs get cooked rather than incubated. Some variations have a spring- or crank-turned device that turns the eggs.

Ink.name: 墨水（Ink）
Ink.description:
Source PZO1110

  这个小瓶含有1盎司的墨水。彩色墨水的价格是黑色墨水的两倍。 价格 8 gp; 重量 -

Ink, Fire.name: Ink, Fire（Ink, Fire）
Ink, Fire.description:
Source PZO1121

  This rich yellow ink reacts with a creature's body heat to create a flickering, flame-like glow. It takes 10 minutes to apply fire ink, and 1 dose covers an approximately hand-sized area. Once applied, the ink glows as a candle for 24 hours. Four or more doses applied to the same part of the body glow as a torch for 24 hours. The alchemical reaction of the ink to the target's skin and body heat is painful and irritating, giving the target the sickened condition while the glow lasts. A DC 15 Heal check can temporarily soothe these sensations, negating the sickened condition for 1 hour. Creatures immune or resistant to fire are immune to this sickening effect. Ifrits are especially known for their fondness for fire ink, and ifrit fire-dancers often decorate their skin with flaming designs before performing. A concentrated version of the ink costs 10 times as much and can be used to make permanently glowing tattoos.

Ink, Ghost.name: Ink, Ghost（Ink, Ghost）
Ink, Ghost.description:
Source SoS

  Pale blue when wet, ghost ink quickly dries to near transparency 1 minute after application. Ghost ink is most often used to blaze trails and mark locations in a subtle manner. The pigment shines with a warm red glow under the light shed by fire beetle glands and sunrods, but under optimal normal conditions (such as a pale surface like parchment or a plaster wall) can only be noticed with a successful DC 25 Perception check. One vial of ghost ink is the size of a potion vial and sufficient for writing a page's worth of characters.

Ink, Glowing.name: 闪光墨水（Ink, Glowing）
Ink, Glowing.description:
价格：5GP重量：-

  这种特别的墨水通常含有深海动物，发光昆虫或发光菌类的萃取物。用发光墨水书写的话，它会在纸面上发出稳定而微弱的光芒（通常是绿色或红色）使你可以在完全的黑暗中阅读——也包括法魔法造成的黑暗（比如法术黑暗术，但在更强的幽深黑暗术则中则不行）。如果把发光墨水涂在某一物体上，它也会发光，为确定它位置的察觉检定提供+2加值。如果把发光墨水溶进彩弹中，那么被彩弹溅射到的物体也会在黑暗中发光，直到彩弹的颜色消褪。

Ink, Invisible.name: 隐形墨水（Ink, Invisible）
Ink, Invisible.description:
价格：变化重量：-

  简易隐形墨水：2GP

  一般隐形墨水：10GP

  精制隐形墨水：25GP

  高级隐形墨水：75GP

  世界各地的特工人员，叛党和其他秘密组织都会使用隐形墨水。通常情况下，隐形墨水书写的内容需要通过特定的条件才能显现出来。如果你掌握了显影的方法，将一页隐形墨水书写的内容显示出来需要一轮时间。如果你没有特定的手段，那么你需要通过一个手艺（炼金术）检定来花费1小时时间揭示隐形墨水书写的内容（根据不同品质的墨水揭露DC也不同）。

  简易隐形墨水：这种隐形墨水通常只有一种简单的显影手段，比如加热或涂上醋酸（揭露DC20）。

  一般隐形墨水：这种隐形墨水可能需要两种普通的显影手段或是一种特殊的显影手段，比如血液或特定种类的酸（揭露DC25）。

  精制隐形墨水：这种隐形墨水需要两种特殊的显影手段或一种罕见的显影手段，比如特定年代窖藏的葡萄酒或某种怪物的血（揭露DC30）。

  高级隐形墨水：这种最隐蔽的隐形墨水可能需要两种罕见的显影手段或一种独一无二的方式才能显影，比如某个特定人的血液（揭露DC35）。

Ink, Light Fire.name: 光燃墨水（Ink, Light Fire）
Ink, Light Fire.description:
价格：40gp；重量：—

  这种经过炼金加工的墨水能够确保秘讯在被阅读后进行自我销毁。在墨水干涸后若被光线直射，墨水中的化学反应大概会在1分钟后引起自燃。这种反应并不强烈——它无法点燃纸张之外的任何东西。在石头或木材之类的其他物质上使用该墨水并不会留下任何痕迹，墨水只是单纯地消失掉而已。1瓶光燃墨水足够写下10条不足50个字的短讯息。

Ink, Stink.name: Ink, Stink（Ink, Stink）
Ink, Stink.description:
Source PZO1121

  Stink ink is a special, pungent, musk-based ink that allows its user to encode information with smell rather than visually. Stink ink dries clear but its sharp, extremely localized smell can be picked out by those with sensitive enough noses to make it possible to read by sense of smell. Only creatures with the keen senses trait or scent ability can read stink ink without aid of some form of magic. Reading or writing something with stink ink takes twice as long as going through the same amount of information written in normal ink.

Ink, Stink (Arcane).name: Ink, Stink (Arcane)（Ink, Stink (Arcane)）
Ink, Stink (Arcane).description:
Source PZO1121

  Most 普通 among ratfolk alchemists, arcane stink ink is used to inscribe formulae or spells into formula books and spellbooks. Like normal stink ink, the arcane version can only be read by creatures with the scent ability (although read magic works normally on spells and arcane formulae inscribed with stink ink). Using arcane stink ink to inscribe a spell or formula into a book costs +10% of the normal amount.

Inkpen.name: 墨水笔（Inkpen）
Inkpen.description:
Source PZO1110

  价格 1 sp; 重量 -

  这是一个有金属笔尖的木制笔头，浸入于小瓶中的墨水后可以保留少量的墨水。

Ioun Torch.name: Ioun Torch（Ioun Torch）
Ioun Torch.description:
Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 305, Advanced Player's Guide pg. 306
Aura strong universal; CL 12th
Slot none; 价格 75 gp; 重量 —

描述

  This item is merely a burned out, dull gray ioun stone with a continual flame spell cast upon it. It retains the ability to float and orbit, and allows the bearer to carry light and still have his hands free. It may be in any crystalline shape 普通 to ioun stones (ellipsoid, prism, sphere, and so on).

Construction

  Requirements Craft Wondrous Item, continual flame, creator must be 12th level; Cost 62 gp, 5 SP

Iron Maiden.name: Iron Maiden（Iron Maiden）
Iron Maiden.description:
Source: PZO1135

  价格 500 gp; 重量 300 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  These dreadful devices are large, stylized iron coffins lined with sharp spikes used to torture and execute unfortunate victims.

  When a Small or Medium creature is forced within the iron maiden and the spiked doors are slammed shut, the creature is impaled on all sides by the iron spikes, immediately taking 3d6 points of piercing damage.

Rack

Source: PZO1135

  价格 300 gp; 重量 500 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  The rack is one of the most infamous and feared devices in the torturer's arsenal, capable of inflicting ruinous damage to a victim's body. Helpless victims are splayed across the device's frame, and each limb is lashed to a central windlass. Each turn of the crank deals a cumulative 1d6 points of nonlethal damage, up to 4d6 points of nonlethal damage on the fourth turn. Each subsequent turn after the fourth deals 4d6 points of nonlethal damage and deals 1 point of damage each to the victim's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution scores as it dislocates limbs, cracks cartilage, and breaks bone. Some racks are fitted with spiked wheels that puncture the victim's body, dealing lethal damage rather than nonlethal damage. Escaping from a rack requires a successful DC 30 Escape Artist check.

Rat Cage

Source: PZO1135

  价格 5 gp; 重量 15 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  This specially crafted steel cage can hold up to 20 rats, and includes stout leather straps around its open end and a metal crucible for holding hot charcoal or other fuel on its top end. Torturers tightly strap the open end of the device to a helpless victim's abdomen, insert the rats into the cage, and set the crucible's fuel alight. In 1d10 rounds, the increasing heat causes the rats to gnaw and dig their way through the victim's abdomen to escape, dealing 1 point of piercing damage per rat each round. A victim can wiggle free of a rat cage with a successful DC 20 Escape Artist check, though some of the voracious vermin may continue their consumption in subsequent rounds.

Thumbscrew

Source: PZO1135

  Common 价格 15 gp; 重量 1 磅; Masterwork 价格 50 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  Both a torture and restraining device, this small, metal armature consists of two parallel, spike-studded bars that close together as the user tightens the frame's screws, crushing a victim's thumbs between them. A victim restrained by a thumbscrew is able to move but can't effectively wield weapons, hold items, or perform any actions or skill checks that require manual dexterity, taking a -5 penalty on all such actions and dealing 1d6 points of nonlethal damage to himself with each attempt (this doesn't include Escape Artist attempts to escape the thumbscrew).

  Spellcasters bound by thumbscrews are unable to cast spells with somatic components.

  When using a thumbscrew as a torture device, the user can turn the thumbscrew's bolt to deal 1d6 points of nonlethal damage.

  Escaping from a thumbscrew requires a successful DC 28 Escape Artist check (DC 30 for a masterwork thumbscrew).

Trephine

Source: PZO1135

  价格 20 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  This surgical instrument has a serrated, circular blade that is used to bore holes into the skulls of patients to relieve cranial swelling from head trauma or, as some chirurgeons believe, release evil spirits. Use of a trephine takes 10 minutes, and deals 5 points of piercing damage to the subject creature. With a successful DC 25 Heal check, the user can heal up to 1d4 points of ability damage to any one mental ability score caused by physical trauma to the head, such as the critical called shot or debilitating blow called shot, or it can cure the severe brain trauma inflicted by the debilitating blow called shot. If the user fails the check, the subject still takes 5 points of piercing damage. If the user fails the check by 5 or more, the subject instead takes 10 points of piercing damage and 1 point of damage each to its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

Jetcaster.name: Jetcaster（Jetcaster）
Jetcaster.description:
Source Dungeoneer's Handbook pg. 24
价格 80 gp; 重量 6 磅
分类 冒险装备

描述

  This device consists of one watertight central ammunition bladder and several air bladders linked by specialized nozzles. When the wielder compresses the air bladders (a standard action that doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity), the jetcaster sprays its ammunition in a 10-foot cone. Most adventurers use a jetcaster to spray powder over invisible foes or holy water over incorporeal undead, but it can also spray oil, itching powder, sneezing powder, or other mundane dusts and liquids.

Loading the ammunition bladder is a full-round action that provokes attacks of opportunity and requires either a 4-品脱 jug of liquid (weighing up to 4 pounds) or a 4-pound sack of powder; insufficient ammunition causes it to misfire harmlessly. Refilling the air bladders is a move action that doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity. Readying and firing a jetcaster requires two hands.

If a jetcaster fires ordinary powder or oil, each square in the cone is coated in that substance. If a jetcaster fires holy water, itching powder, or sneezing powder, treat each square in the cone as a square of impact and each square adjacent to the cone (including the wielder’s) as an adjacent square for the purpose of determining effects and DCs. Loading a jetcaster with unstable compounds such as acid or alchemist’s fire destroys the device.

Jewelry.name: 首饰（Jewelry）
Jewelry.description:
价格：可变；重量：可变

  首饰的价值依照其本身的质量会有较大范围的变动。在许多文化，特别是游牧民族中，会将首饰作为一种方便携带的财产，其中最值得注意的便是由钱币熔铸而成的腰带和手镯。平民百姓拿来作为饰品的东西可能只值几个铜板，工匠佩戴的则可能价值几个银币，而商人可能会付出一些金币来购置首饰，不过贵族佩戴在身上的珠宝很少会低于100gp。

Jewelry, False.name: Jewelry, False（Jewelry, False）
Jewelry, False.description:
Source Rise of the Runelords Player's Guide

  Favored by rogues, these adornments hide tiny secret compartments. False jewelry grants a +8 bonus on Sleight of Hand checks to hide a tiny object on your person (does not stack with the bonus for hiding very small objects) and negates the +4 bonuses searchers receive when frisking you. False jewelry costs 20 gp in addition to the value of the ornament being fitted with the secret compartment.

Journal, blank.name: 日记本（Journal, blank）
Journal, blank.description:
Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 57, Pathfinder Society Field Guide pg. 47

描述

  这是一本拥有油布封面，重量很轻的空白日记本。它有50页。

Jug, Clay.name: 陶壶（Jug, Clay）
Jug, Clay.description:
Source PZO1110

  这种普通陶壶有一个塞子，可以容纳1加仑的液体。

  重量: 1 磅; 容积: 1 加仑/8 磅

Keif.name: Keif（Keif）
Keif.description:
Source PZO9445

  价格 15 gp; 重量 -

  When used as an alchemical reagent, refined keif is often sublimated along with other reagents to create new forms of the famous drug.

Alchemical Power Component

  Doses 1 (15 gp); Spells enchantment school

  Spells of the enchantment school are cast at +1 caster level for the purpose of determining duration.

Key, Copy.name: 拷贝钥匙（Key, Copy）
Key, Copy.description:
Source: PZO9410

  一个工匠可以在一小时内复制一把钥匙（制作一个与真品完全相同的复制品需要一个熟练的工匠，一天时间，以及一个DC25的工艺检定）。

Key, Skeleton.name: Key, Skeleton（Key, Skeleton）
Key, Skeleton.description:
Source: PZO9410

  Many door locks have a similar design and thus can be unlocked by a similar key. A skeleton key may be tried on any standard door lock that uses a key, even if you don't have the Disable Device skill. You use the key's Disable Device bonus of +10 rather than your own total; you cannot take 10 when using a skeleton key. The key only gets one roll for any particular lock. If the roll fails, the key is unable to open or close that lock. Inferior skeleton keys may only have a +5 bonus.

Key, Wax Blank.name: 蜡模（Key, Wax Blank）
Key, Wax Blank.description:
Source: PZO9410

  这个两面的盒子内包含了一些柔软的蜡状物，容易获得并保留按压在两部分之间物体的印痕 ，制作出该物体的一个完美模具。一个熟练的工匠可以利用模具制作一个该物品的复制品（其过程会破坏模具）。偷偷的印模需要一个DC 25 的手上功夫检定。

Kilt.name: 褶裥短裙（Kilt）
Kilt.description:
价格：2sp；重量：1磅

  这种厚实短裙的穿戴者通常是男性。此类服装上大多会有特殊的图案或花纹，用于代表穿戴者所效忠的特定部族或其他社会团体。

Kit, Alchemist's.name: 炼金术士工具包（kit, Alchemist's）
Kit, Alchemist's.description:
价格：40金币; 重量： 24磅。

  该工具包包括炼金术制作工具，一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和铁片，墨水，一支墨水笔，铁壶，一套餐具，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。这个工具包并没有包含公式书，因为炼金术士起始就有一本公式书而不用再另外购买。

Kit, Alchemy Crafting.name: Kit, Alchemy Crafting（Kit, Alchemy Crafting）
Kit, Alchemy Crafting.description: An @Compendium[pf1.classes.JcaqlAawhf14q1lq]{Alchemist} with an alchemy crafting kit is assumed to have all the material components needed for his extracts, mutagens, and bombs, except for those components that have a specific cost. An alchemy crafting kit provides no bonuses on @Compendium[pf1.skills.L6LEhHRrn53cMuhE]{Craft (alchemy)} checks. (This item was previously called an "alchemist's kit", and was renamed to avoid confusion with the set of adventuring gear called an "alchemist's kit.")

Kit, Animal Call.name: 兽鸣哨（Kit, Animal Call）
Kit, Animal Call.description:
价格：1sp；重量：—

  这些用竹子或芦苇做出的哨子能够模仿各种动物的叫声。每个哨子都专门用于发出某种特定类型动物的特殊叫声（通常为发现食物的信号或者求偶时吸引伴侣的声音）。若能够正确使用哨子，你便会在使用生存检定追踪特定类型的动物或者荒野求生（get along in the wild）时获得+2加值。

Kit, Antidote.name: Kit, Antidote（Kit, Antidote）
Kit, Antidote.description:
价格 100 gp; 重量 3 磅

  This small box contains a wide variety of remedies and treatments against not only specific poisons but also their most 普通 methods of delivery, including such things as purgatives to eliminate ingested toxins. It grants a +3 circumstance bonus on Heal checks made to treat poison. An antidote kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Arcanist's.name: 奥能师工具包（Kit, Arcanist's）
Kit, Arcanist's.description:
价格：21gp；重量：34磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1瓶墨水（Ink）、1根墨水笔（inkpen）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1块肥皂（soap）、1个法术材料包（spell component pouch）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）以及1个水袋（waterskin）。这套工具包内并不包含法术书是因为，奥能师在游戏开始时便拥有一本法术书，无需重复购买。

Kit, Barbarian's.name: 野蛮人工具包（kit, Barbarian's）
Kit, Barbarian's.description:
价格：9 GP; 重量： 26磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个腰包，一张毛毯，燧石和铁片，铁壶，麻绳，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Bard's.name: 诗人工具包（kit, Bard's）
Kit, Bard's.description:
价格： 41金币; 重量： 33-1/2磅。

  该工具包包含一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，一件普通乐器，燧石和铁片，墨水，一支墨水笔，铁壶，一本日记本，一套餐具，镜子，麻绳，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Bloodrager's.name: 血脉狂怒者工具包（Kit, Bloodrager's）
Kit, Bloodrager's.description:
价格：9gp；重量：27磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1块肥皂（soap）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）以及1个水袋（waterskin）。

Kit, Bounty Hunter's.name: Kit, Bounty Hunter's（Kit, Bounty Hunter's）
Kit, Bounty Hunter's.description:
Source: PZO9455

  价格 varies; 重量 varies

  普通 105 gp 15 磅

  Superior 380 gp 24 磅

  This kit provides useful tools for bounty hunters. It includes basic maps showing major landmarks, caltrops, 普通 manacles with an average lock, a net, a sap, and a 10-foot chain. Bounty hunters are notoriously individualistic, so variant kits are 普通. One such variant is the superior bounty hunter's kit, which replaces the 普通 manacles with masterwork manacles and the average lock with a good lock, and includes a footprint book, a tanglefoot bag, and masterwork thieves' tools.

Kit, Brawler's.name: 拳师工具包（Kit, Brawler's）
Kit, Brawler's.description:
价格：9gp；重量：36.5磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1根麻绳（rope）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）以及1个水袋（waterskin）。

Kit, Breaker's.name: Kit, Breaker's（Kit, Breaker's）
Kit, Breaker's.description:
Source: PZO9430

  价格 353 gp; 重量 40 磅

  This kit contains all manner of items useful for smashing down doors, creating diversions, and blowing things up. It includes a dose of alchemist's glue, a flask of alchemist's fire, a crowbar, a drill, a fuse grenade, a glass cutter, a jetcaster, a vial of phosphorescent gel, 4 pints of oil, a portable ram, a dose of rusting powder, 5 tindertwigs, and a wire

Kit, Campsite.name: 露营工具箱（kit, Campsite）
Kit, Campsite.description:
价格： 12金币; 重量：80磅。

  这个工具箱实际由四个部分组成，因此可有由4个人分别负担。它包括了四个睡袋，四张毛毯，一天份量的柴火，燧石和铁片，一盒火柴，四套餐具，炊具，口粮（8天）（希望冒险者在旅途中进行一些狩猎以补充口粮）。预料到恶劣天气的冒险者同时也应该补充购买一顶或更多的帐篷。

Kit, Cat Burglar's.name: Kit, Cat Burglar's（Kit, Cat Burglar's）
Kit, Cat Burglar's.description:
价格 15 gp; 重量 12 磅

  This kit includes a glass cutter, glue paper (5 sheets), a grappling hook, a masterwork backpack, and silk rope (50 feet).

Kit, Cavalier's.name: 骑士工具包（kit, Cavalier's）
Kit, Cavalier's.description:
价格： 23金币; 重量： 112磅。

  该工具包包括饲料（5天），一个背包，一个睡袋，一个腰包，一套嚼子和缰绳，燧石和铁片，铁壶，一套餐具，一个乘骑用鞍，麻绳，鞍囊，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天份）和一个水袋。

Kit, Chirurgeon's.name: 外科医师工具包（kit, Chirurgeon's）
Kit, Chirurgeon's.description:
价格： 400金币; 重量： 4磅。

  这种坚固的皮套可以系在腰部或腿部，也可以挂在肩膀上。它包含了一个皮革小袋子，一个治疗者工具包，一瓶高浓度白兰地，一瓶治疗轻伤药水，一小瓶嗅盐，两剂炼金解酒药（炼金师的恩惠），抗病剂（抗生素），抗毒剂，止血剂和舒缓糖浆。

Kit, Chronicler's.name: Kit, Chronicler's（Kit, Chronicler's）
Kit, Chronicler's.description:
价格 40 gp; 重量 4-1/2 磅

  This bundle contains a map case, two vials of ink, two inkpens, 10 sheets of paper, two blank journals, a pound of fine powder for drying ink, and a 20-foot measuring cord. The supplies usually suffice for chronicling a single expedition of not more than 2 months' duration.

Kit, Cleric's.name: 牧师工具包（kit, Cleric's）
Kit, Cleric's.description:
价格： 16金币; 重量： 32磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个睡袋，一个腰包，蜡烛（10），一本便宜的教典，燧石和铁片，铁壶，一套餐具，麻绳，肥皂，一个法术材料包，火把（10），口粮（5天），水袋和一个木制圣徽。

Kit, Climber's.name: 攀爬工具（Kit, Climber's）
Kit, Climber's.description:
价格：80GP；重量：5磅

  这套工具包括钉鞋，岩钉，绳子和其他攀岩装备，在你的攀爬技能检定上提供+2环境加值。

Kit, Cooking.name: 烹饪工具箱（kit, Cooking）
Kit, Cooking.description:
价格： 3金币; 重量： 16磅。

  该工具箱包含一个铁壶，一个铁锅，一个勺子，一个烤肉叉，一个木制菜板，一个切割刀，一个铁质三脚架，一包火种和一小包本地或其他地方容易找到的调味料。你可以把烤肉叉架在三脚架上来烧烤一些小动物。所有的组件（除了锅之外）都都符合铁罐的大小以便于储存和运输。

Kit, Courtesan's.name: 交际花工具箱（Kit, Courtesan's）
Kit, Courtesan's.description:
价格：10gp；重量：5磅

  这个工具箱里包含了各种帮助交际花抚慰人心与身体的道具。在打扮方面，工具箱里容纳了1把剃刀、各种带香味的精油和软膏、香水、1个保温壶、以及各种勾人眼球的服装。此外还有关于诗歌、文学和戏剧的书籍——这些书的内容通常侧重于较为色情的主题和各种双关语——用以慰藉心灵。

Kit, Disguise.name: Kit, Disguise（Kit, Disguise）
Kit, Disguise.description:
价格 50 gp; 重量 8 磅

  This kit contains tools like makeup and fake facial hair, and provides a +2 circumstance bonus on Disguise checks. A disguise kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Disguise, Statue.name: Kit, Disguise, Statue（Kit, Disguise, Statue）
Kit, Disguise, Statue.description:
价格 50 gp; 重量 8 磅

  This disguise kit includes metallic or stone-colored makeup and cloth that you can apply to appear to be a statue; it grants a +2 bonus only on Disguise checks to resemble metal, stone, or similar materials. You take a -5 penalty on Disguise checks when impersonating an inanimate object. A viewer can attempt a single Perception check opposed by your Disguise check upon viewing you, and an additional check each time a creature interacts with you. This kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Diver's.name: Kit, Diver's（Kit, Diver's）
Kit, Diver's.description:
Source: PZO9430

  价格 121 gp; 重量 38 磅

  This kit is ideal for adventurers who venture into sunken ruins or half-flooded temples, and includes an air bladder, a 普通 buoy, 30 feet of chain, a fishing net, a glass bottle, a pound of soap, three sunrods, a waterproof bag, and a waterproof hooded lantern with 3 flasks of oil.

Kit, Dragonslayer's.name: 巨龙杀手工具箱（kit, Dragonslayer's）
Kit, Dragonslayer's.description:
价格： 485金币; 重量： 64磅。

  本工具箱主要针对的是雇佣兵，而不是富有经验的冒险者，它提供了一些用于屠龙、适用于雇佣兵的补充装备。包括一瓶治治疗中伤药水，一份祝福武器油，一支长矛，一个背包，三个大麻袋，一支照明杖，一面塔盾以及五瓶炽火胶。

  若要猎杀免疫火的龙，那么购买时可以将炽火胶会替换成强酸瓶，这会节省50GP。

Kit, Dungeoneering.name: 地城探险工具箱（kit, Dungeoneering）
Kit, Dungeoneering.description:
类型 价格 重量

  普通 15 GP 25磅

  豪华 130 GP 15磅

  这套用于探索废墟和废弃城市的必备用品箱包括两只蜡烛，粉笔，一把锤子和四个岩钉，50英尺的麻绳，一个附盖提灯，五瓶灯油，两只火把和四盒火柴。豪华版地城探险工具箱包括了两只蜡烛，粉笔，一把锤子和四个岩钉，50英尺的丝绳，两个麻袋，三根照明棒，四盒火柴和一根永燃火把。

Kit, Entertainer's.name: 杂耍工具箱（kit, Entertainer's）
Kit, Entertainer's.description:
价格： 5 SP 重量： 3磅。

  该工具箱包括杂耍球，彩色手帕，纸牌，小丑化妆用道具，还一些街头魔术师或者其他街道演员的小道具。

Kit, Fighter's.name: 战士工具包（kit, Fighter's）
Kit, Fighter's.description:
价格： 9 GP 重量： 29磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和铁片，一个铁壶，一套餐具，麻绳，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Fishing.name: 钓鱼工具箱（kit, Fishing）
Kit, Fishing.description:
价格： 5 SP 重量： 3磅。

  该工具箱包括了一个简单的钓竿和装有钓鱼用具的小盒子（鱼钩、鱼线、坠子、浮标和诱饵）。

Kit, Forger's.name: 伪造文书工具包（Kit, Forger's）
Kit, Forger's.description:
价格：200GP；重量：6磅

  这套工具包括了笔墨，绘纸，官方证件的模板以及成套复制印信与证明文件的工具。它可以在你用来伪造文书的语言学技能检定上提供+2环境加值。

Kit, Gambler's.name: 赌博工具箱（kit, Gambler's）
Kit, Gambler's.description:
普通 75 GP 5磅

  作弊 300 GP 5磅

  这个小而紧凑的行李箱里有了几幅牌，一个赌博轮盘，一些标号牌，彩色木签，以及其他各种各样不同种类的游戏所必须的专门道具，因此对于那些在太小或太偏辟的地方旅行的人或刚从事全职主持赌博的人来说，它特别有用。作弊赌博工具包和这个非常类似，除了里面的纸牌标记过，其他的游戏也能够被操控。作弊赌博工具包被那些知识丰富的使用者使用时，可以在专业（赌博）上提供+2的环境加值。DC25的察觉检定或DC20的专业（赌博）检定可以发现装置里的诡计。

Kit, Gear Maintenance.name: 物品保养工具箱（kit, Gear maintenance）

Kit, Ghost Hunter's.name: Kit, Ghost Hunter's（Kit, Ghost Hunter's）
Kit, Ghost Hunter's.description:
Source: USH

  价格 670 gp; 重量 22 磅

  This sturdy satchel is the quintessential toolkit for detecting ghosts and sending them to their final slumber. This kit includes 10 candles, three flasks of holy water, one potion of lesser restoration, a crowbar, a folding shovel, four sunrods, one spiritbane spike, and a wooden holy symbol.

Kit, Gravedigger's.name: Kit, Gravedigger's（Kit, Gravedigger's）
Kit, Gravedigger's.description:
Source: USH

  价格 265 gp; 重量 22 磅

  This kit provides all the tools necessary to seal a coffin or other burial container and ensure that it stays closed. It includes 20 feet of chain, a good lock, 1 dose of alchemical cement, a folding shovel, a stubborn nail, and a leather-bound copy of a holy text.

Kit, Grooming.name: 梳洗工具箱（kit, Grooming）
Kit, Grooming.description:
价格： 1金币; 重量： 2磅。

  这袋洗漱用品包括了一把梳子，一把剪刀，一把指甲锉，一块海绵，一面小镜子，肥皂，牙签和牙粉。

Kit, Gunslinger's.name: 铳士工具包（kit, Gunslinger's）
Kit, Gunslinger's.description:
价格： 26金币， 重量： 31磅。

  该工具包包含了一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和铁片，枪匠工具箱，铁壶，一套餐具，一个火药角，麻绳，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Gunsmith's.name: 枪匠工具箱（kit, Gunsmith's）
Kit, Gunsmith's.description:
价格： 15金币， 重量： 2磅。

  除了必要的原料之外，这个小工具箱包括了所一个人制作、修理和维护火器所需的所有工具。若没有这个工具箱，你就无法恰当的制作和保养火器

Kit, Harvester's.name: Kit, Harvester's（Kit, Harvester's）
Kit, Harvester's.description:
Source: PZO9487

  价格 65 gp; 重量 -

  This set of surgical tools includes everything needed to quickly and safely harvest the venom from a dead creature. This kit includes forceps, a pair of surgical retractors, a scalpel, small but sturdy metal containers for the harvested venom, a sponge, a surgical hook, and a tiny mallet, all tucked into a leather pouch with a loop for hooking onto the wearer's belt. A harvester's kit provides a +2 circumstance bonus on Survival checks to successfully harvest poison from a creature.

  A harvester's kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Healer's.name: Kit, Healer's（Kit, Healer's）
Kit, Healer's.description:
价格 50 gp; 重量 1 磅

  This collection of bandages and herbs provides a +2 circumstance bonus on Heal checks. A healer's kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Hunter's.name: 猎人工具包（Kit, Hunter's）
Kit, Hunter's.description:
价格：15gp；重量：43.5磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1根麻绳（rope）、1个法术材料包（spell component pouch）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）、1个水袋（waterskin）和1个木制圣徽（wooden holy symbol）。

Kit, Infiltration.name: Kit, Infiltration（Kit, Infiltration）
Kit, Infiltration.description:
价格 140 gp; 重量 15 磅

  This kit is useful to adventurers who must practice guile and deception in order to acquire useful information, and includes a set of caltrops, chalk, a disguise kit, an ear trumpet, fake footprint shoes, a skeleton key, and a wrist sheath. For Small creatures, the weight of an infiltration kit is 9 pounds.

Kit, Inquisitor's.name: 审判者工具包（kit, Inquisitor's）
Kit, Inquisitor's.description:
价格： 30金币， 重量： 34磅。

  该工具包包括：一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，蜡烛（10），一个廉价的教典，燧石和钢铁片，铁壶，镣铐，一套餐具，麻绳，肥皂，一个施法材料包，火把（10 ），口粮（5天），水袋和一个木制的圣徽。

Kit, Investigator's.name: 调查员工具包（Kit, Investigator's）
Kit, Investigator's.description:
价格：40gp；重量：37磅

  这套工具包包含1套炼成工具包（Kit, Alchemy Crafting Kit）、1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1瓶墨水（Ink）、1根墨水笔（inkpen）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1块肥皂（soap）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）以及1个水袋（waterskin）。这套工具包内并不包含公式簿是因为，调查员在游戏开始时便拥有一本公式簿，无需重复购买。

Kit, Juggler's.name: 杂耍工具包（Kit, Juggler's）
Kit, Juggler's.description:
价格：15GP，重量：10磅

  这套工具里装有好几副平衡良好的玩具，比如小球，飞刀，圆环和火把。在你进行杂耍表演时它会为你的表演（戏剧或喜剧）技能检定提供+1加值。

Kit, Knight's.name: Kit, Knight's（Kit, Knight's）
Kit, Knight's.description:
Source: PZO9434

  价格 751 gp; 重量 17 磅

  This kit is designed for melee-focused warriors who hope to kill or capture a dragon. It includes 50 feet of chain, a crowbar, an everburning torch, an application of fire (or frost) ward gel, fire-resistant boots, a potion of resist energy, three sacks, a shield sconce, a simple lock, and a weapon cord.

Kit, Leeching.name: Kit, Leeching（Kit, Leeching）
Kit, Leeching.description:
价格 5 gp; 重量 5 磅

  This sturdy ceramic jar has a heavy lid with a few tiny holes to let air in. It is normally half-filled with water and contains four adult leeches, each about 6 inches long. A leeching kit grants you a +2 circumstance bonus on Heal checks to treat poison. Used for medicinal bloodletting, a leech can survive for 6 months between feedings.

Kit, Light.name: Kit, Light（Kit, Light）
Kit, Light.description:
Source: USH

  价格 170 gp; 重量 6 磅

  Ideal for use in subterranean environments or in combat against light-averse creatures, this small kit provides ample alchemical and magical sources of illumination. It contains an ioun torch, flash powder, a pair of sunrods, four torches, and six tindertwigs.

Kit, Magus's.name: 魔战士工具包（kit, Magus's）
Kit, Magus's.description:
价格： 22金币， 重量： 31磅。

  这个工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和铁片，墨水，一个墨水笔，铁锅，一套餐具，麻绳，肥皂，一个施法材料包，火把（10），口粮（5天份） 和一个水袋。本工具包不包含法术书，因为魔战士开始游戏时就拥有一本。

Kit, Mapmaker's.name: 绘图师工具包（Kit, Mapmaker's）
Kit, Mapmaker's.description:
价格：10GP；重量：2磅

  这个小盒子里装有一块刻有网格的石板和很多种不同颜色的粉笔，如果你在旅行的途中使用它来绘制地图，你们你可以在防止自己迷失方向的生存技能检定上获得+2环境加值。

Kit, Melee Contingency.name: Kit, Melee Contingency（Kit, Melee Contingency）
Kit, Melee Contingency.description:
Source: PZO9455

  价格 150 gp; 重量 14 磅

  This kit contains items necessary for a melee combatant to overcome the most 普通 forms of damage resistance. The kit includes a cold iron morningstar, a silver sickle, two flasks of acid, two flasks of alchemist's fire, and two flasks of holy water.

Kit, Mess.name: 餐具（Kit, Mess）
Kit, Mess.description: 一套餐具包括了由木材、牛角或锡制作的盘子，碗，杯，叉，刀和勺子。每件物品都有一个手柄或小洞，可以使用已包含在餐具内的皮绳绑在一起。

Kit, Midwife's.name: 助产士工具包（Kit, Midwife's）
Kit, Midwife's.description:
价格：10GP；重量：2磅

  这些工具可以帮助一个助产士护理产妇和接生婴儿，其中包括了在产期对孕妇有益的草药，止痛和舒缓用的油膏，襁褓布，一把用来割断脐带的锋利小刀，清洁新生儿的香粉，绷带，以及缝合用的针线。在帮助人型生物的孕产时这件工具包可以为你在医疗检定上提供+4加值。如果你用它来处理非类人生物（如动物和人型怪物）的生产，那么这件工具提供的加值降低到+2。

Kit, Monk's.name: 武僧工具包（kit, Monk's）
Kit, Monk's.description:
价格： 8 GP 重量： 22磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个腰包，一张毛毯，麻绳，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天份）和一个水袋。

Kit, Noble's Excursion.name: Kit, Noble's Excursion（Kit, Noble's Excursion）
Kit, Noble's Excursion.description:
价格 371 gp; 重量 242 磅

  This extravagant, ridiculous, and mostly ineffective kit is touted by nobles seeking to venture into the wilderness. It consists of a complex banner (depicting a family crest or symbol of the presiding noble), four bedrolls (for servants), four blankets (for servants), two cots (for nobles), two winter blankets (for nobles), 10 cups of coffee, a royal outfit, two large tents, and a pavilion tent.

  Anyone with a modicum of wilderness experience should recognize that the kit's contents are of little use on a prolonged journey. Oftentimes, the actual necessities of wilderness survival are left to the servants to handle.

Kit, Oracle's.name: 先知工具包（kit, Oracle's）
Kit, Oracle's.description:
价格： 9 GP 重量： 29磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，蜡烛（10），燧石和铁片，铁壶，餐具，麻绳，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天份）和一个水袋。

Kit, Out-Of-Towner's.name: Kit, Out-Of-Towner's（Kit, Out-Of-Towner's）
Kit, Out-Of-Towner's.description:
价格 55 gp; 重量 1 磅

  This bundle is often given to operatives sent to new cities to help them operate as easily as locals. This kit includes a blue book, a city map (see above), and fashionable accessories (see above).

Kit, Paladin's.name: 圣武士工具包（kit, Paladin's）
Kit, Paladin's.description:
价格： 11金币; 重量： 30磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，一本廉价的教典，燧石和铁片，铁壶，餐具，麻绳，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天），一个水袋和一个木制的圣徽。

Kit, Pathfinder's.name: 探索者工具包（kit, Pathfinder's）
Kit, Pathfinder's.description:
价格： 12金币; 重量： 22磅。

  该工具包有一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰带，一个粘土杯，一把匕首，两个鱼钩，燧石和钢片，缝纫针，一个信号笛，50英尺的丝绳，50英尺的麻绳，一个水袋，一星期份的口粮和磨刀石。对于小型生物，探索者套件的 重量：是7.5磅。将铺盖卷和口粮留在营地或在山上会减少12磅（中型）或3磅（小型）的 重量：。

Kit, Perfume.name: Kit, Perfume（Kit, Perfume）
Kit, Perfume.description:
Source: PZO1134

  价格 40 gp; 重量 10 磅

  A perfume kit consists of an atomizer and a diverse array of perfumes, scented oils, wild flowers, and herbs. Applying scents from a perfume kit takes 1 minute, and grants you a +1 circumstance bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, Disguise, Handle Animal, Intimidate, or Perform checks, subject to GM discretion.

  You must choose the type of check when you apply the fragrances.

  This bonus typically doesn't apply in combat or against hostile creatures, and might not work on creatures without olfactory senses or who would be more offended than entranced by your scent. The bonus lasts for 4 hours. You can gain only one bonus from a perfume kit at a time, and the bonus from perfume does not stack with bonuses from any masterwork tools you possess for the same skill. A perfume kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Pyramid Buster's.name: Kit, Pyramid Buster's（Kit, Pyramid Buster's）
Kit, Pyramid Buster's.description:
Source: USH

  价格 310 gp; 重量 8 磅

  This kit contains items helpful in navigating the winding corridors of pyramids, but is also useful in other crypts and tombs. It contains three sticks of chalk, five sheets of parchment, 1 dose of synthetic mumia, a flask of alchemist's fire, a tangleburn bag, and a pair of sunrods.

Kit, Ranger's.name: 游侠工具包（kit, Ranger's）
Kit, Ranger's.description:
价格： 9 GP 重量： 28磅。

  这个工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和贴片，铁壶，餐具，麻绳，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Riding.name: Kit, Riding（Kit, Riding）
Kit, Riding.description:
Type 价格 重量
普通 16 gp 54 磅
Exotic Mount 36 gp 59 磅

  This kit includes a bit and bridle, a saddle, a saddle blanket, saddlebags, and 2 days' worth of feed for a mount. The weight can be lightened 10 pounds by discarding the feed.

Kit, Rogue's.name: 盗贼工具包（kit, Rogue's）
Kit, Rogue's.description:
价格： 50金币， 重量： 37磅。

  该套件包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，铁蒺藜，粉笔（10），燧石和铁片，爪钩，铁壶，餐具，镜子，岩钉（10），麻绳，肥皂，盗贼工具，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Scrivener's.name: 文书工具箱（kit, Scrivener's）
Kit, Scrivener's.description:
价格： 2金币; 重量： 1磅。

  这种软皮箱内包含一个用来装墨水的小瓶，一根墨水笔，备用笔尖，一小瓶用于制作墨水的色素，一把将羽毛切割成羽毛笔的小刀，一张吸墨纸和一把小尺子。

Kit, Seance.name: Kit, Seance（Kit, Seance）
Kit, Seance.description:
Source: USH

  价格 290 gp; 重量 12 磅

  This stained mahogany box contains tools that aid in contacting supernatural beings either as part of an act or a genuine ritual. This kit includes a non-magical spirit planchette set (treat as a board game worth 25 gp), 10 candles, 10 candlesticks, one entertainer's outfit, one harrow deck, one magnet, 10 sticks of incense, one scroll of augury, and two scrolls of prestidigitation.

Kit, Shaman's.name: 萨满工具包（Kit, Shaman's）
Kit, Shaman's.description:
价格：15gp；重量：44磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、10根蜡烛（candles）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1根麻绳（rope）、1块肥皂（soap）、1个法术材料包（spell component pouch）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）、1个水袋（waterskin）和1个木制圣徽（wooden holy symbol）

  。

Kit, Shaving.name: 剃须工具箱（kit, Shaving）
Kit, Shaving.description:
价格： 15金币， 重量： 1/2磅。

  剃须工具箱包含一把直剃刀，一块磨刀石，一面小镜子，一个刷子，一个杯子和足够中等人型生物使用50次的剃须粉。

Kit, Signal Kite.name: Kit, Signal Kite（Kit, Signal Kite）
Kit, Signal Kite.description:
Source: PZO1121

  Though wingless, tengus have long cast their thoughts toward the sky and flight. Built from paper glued to bamboo frames, their kites are painted with various colors and pictures. In addition to flying kites as a leisure activity, tengus also fly kites of various shades and patterns to send signal messages. Tengus have developed an extensive code of signals and can use their kites to display complex messages visible at great distances. A signal kite kit includes six small colored kites that can be hooked together in different patterns to facilitate complex messages. The kit also includes a spool and 300 feet of twine. Sending or interpreting a signal kite's message functions as described in the Bluff skill, but the sender and anyone trying to understand the message must also know Tengu.

Kit, Skald's.name: 歌者工具包（Kit, Skald's）
Kit, Skald's.description:
价格：37gp；重量：47.5磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1件普通品质的乐器（common musical instrument）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1面镜子（mirror）、1根麻绳（rope）、1块肥皂（soap）、1个法术材料包（spell component pouch）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）以及1个水袋（waterskin）。

Kit, Skeleton Slayer's.name: Kit, Skeleton Slayer's（Kit, Skeleton Slayer's）
Kit, Skeleton Slayer's.description:
Source: USH

  价格 120 gp; 重量 32 磅

  This kit contains all the tools necessary for clearing out small packs of skeletons from tombs and crypts. It includes three flasks of acid, a club, a sling, 10 sling bullets, two flasks of holy water, a tanglefoot bag, 50 feet of hemp rope, a crowbar, and a wooden holy symbol.

Kit, Slayer's.name: 杀手工具包（Kit, Slayer's）
Kit, Slayer's.description:
价格：22gp；重量：43.5磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1副镣铐（manacles）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1根麻绳（rope）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）以及1个水袋（waterskin）。

Kit, Snakebite.name: Kit, Snakebite（Kit, Snakebite）
Kit, Snakebite.description:
价格 20 gp; 重量 1/2 磅

  This kit contains three pliable suction cups, a constrictor strap, a tiny razor, and several vials of snake antivenom. When suffering a poison that was delivered by the bite attack of a snake (or other ophidian creature, such as a serpentfolk), as a full-round action, you can use this kit to gain a +4 circumstance bonus on the ongoing Fortitude saving throws against that poison. A snakebite kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Sorcerer's.name: 术士工具包（kit, Sorcerer's）
Kit, Sorcerer's.description:
价格： 8 GP 重量： 19磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和铁片，铁壶，一套餐具，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Spelunking.name: 洞穴探险工具箱（kit, Spelunking）
Kit, Spelunking.description:
价格： 174金币; 重量： 32磅。

  此工具箱配有探索地底世界所需的装备，包括：一盏提灯和四瓶灯油，一把锤子和八枚岩钉，100英尺的丝绳，一个抓钩和一个登山者工具包。

Kit, Spy's.name: Kit, Spy's（Kit, Spy's）
Kit, Spy's.description:
价格 140 gp; 重量 12-1/2 磅

  This kit includes a book of letters, a disguise kit, a hollow-heeled boot (see above), ink (1 vial), an inkpen, paper (10 sheets), a poison pill ring (signet ring), sealing wax, simple invisible ink (3 vials), and a wrist sheath.

Kit, Spycatcher's.name: Kit, Spycatcher's（Kit, Spycatcher's）
Kit, Spycatcher's.description:
价格 260 gp; 重量 7-1/2 磅

  This kit includes an antidote kit, a cryptography book (see above), litmus strips (5), and a portrait book.

Kit, Summoner's.name: 召唤师工具包（kit, Summoner's）
Kit, Summoner's.description:
价格： 8 GP 重量： 19磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和铁片，铁壶，一条餐具，肥皂，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Survival.name: Kit, Survival（Kit, Survival）
Kit, Survival.description:
Type 价格 重量
普通 5 gp 4 磅
Masterwork 50 gp 5 磅

  A survival kit provides the necessary tools for day-to-day existence in a temperate wilderness. It typically contains a flint and steel, a mess kit, two waterskins (enough to hold water for 1 person for 1 day), very basic maps showing major landmarks, and a small utility knife.

  A masterwork survival kit contains higher quality gear and a guide to identifying flora and fauna. It grants you a +2 circumstance bonus on Survival checks to get along in the wild, deal with severe weather, keep from getting lost, avoid natural hazards such as quicksand, and predict the weather.

Kit, Swashbuckler's.name: 游荡剑客工具包（Kit, Swashbuckler's）
Kit, Swashbuckler's.description:
价格：9gp；重量：42磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1根麻绳（rope）、1块肥皂（soap）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）以及1个水袋（waterskin）。

Kit, Symptom.name: Kit, Symptom（Kit, Symptom）
Kit, Symptom.description:
价格 25 gp; 重量 5 磅

  This small wooden box has many tiny compartments filled with items useful if you want to feign a sickness, as well as a handy reference book outlining 普通 indicators for some of the more feared virulent diseases. The kit includes such things as false pustules, pills that cause the person chewing them to foam at the mouth, and herbal concoctions designed to induce fevers or vomiting. Using a symptom kit grants you a +5 circumstances bonus on Disguise checks made for the purpose of simulating illness. A symptom kit is exhausted after 10 uses.

Kit, Tanner's.name: Kit, Tanner's（Kit, Tanner's）
Kit, Tanner's.description:
价格 10 gp; 重量 5 磅

  This kit contains a fleshing knife, a bottle of tanning solution, a small tanning board, and a leather apron. If you use this kit to harvest and tan an animal's hide, you receive a +5 circumstance bonus on Craft checks to create leather items such as belts, boots, cloaks, clothing, gloves, or hide or leather armor. A kit contains enough tanning solution to create a total of 150 pounds of leather items.

Kit, Tracker's.name: Kit, Tracker's（Kit, Tracker's）
Kit, Tracker's.description:
Source: PZO9434

  价格 563 gp; 重量 33 磅

  The exact location of a dragon's lair must sometimes be learned through exploration. This kit provides tools helpful in tracking a dragon back to its lair and includes an area map, a climber's kit, an elixir of swimming, an everburning torch, a footprint book, a grappling hook, a hammer, eight pitons, four sacks, and 100 feet of silk rope.

Kit, Trailscent.name: Kit, Trailscent（Kit, Trailscent）
Kit, Trailscent.description:
Source: PZO1121

  This small box of specially prepared catfolk pheromones and alchemical reagents can be used to leave a small group of subtle but long-lasting scents that only catfolk can smell and decipher. Given a minute, a catfolk can create a scent mixture and apply it to a solid object, such as a tree, a wall, or even a smaller item such as a weapon or potion vial. When the catfolk does this, it leaves one of the following scent impressions: danger, food, shelter, or possession. The possession impression is always keyed to the specific catfolk using the kit, and signifies that she owns the territory or item. Other races can attempt to use this kit to create the danger, food, or shelter impression, but doing so requires a successful DC 20 Craft (alchemy) check. A catfolk can detect a particular scent applied with a trailscent kit from 30 feet away. If the scent is upwind, the range at which a catfolk can detect the scent increases to 60 feet; if it is downwind, the range drops to 15 feet. A catfolk with the scent racial quality doubles those distances. A scent impression lasts for 1 year or until it is washed away. Each kit has 10 uses.

Kit, Trapper's.name: Kit, Trapper's（Kit, Trapper's）
Kit, Trapper's.description:
Source: PZO9430

  价格 263 gp; 重量 90 磅

  This kit is particularly useful for dungeon explorers who specialize in trapping or taming whatever vile quarry they find. A trapper's kit contains an average lock, a bear trap, a container of bone paste, a Small cage, a set of manacles, a bag of marbles, 50 feet of silk rope, two tanglefoot bags, 50 feet of twine, and a wire

Kit, Trickster's.name: Kit, Trickster's（Kit, Trickster's）
Kit, Trickster's.description:
Source: PZO9434

  价格 474 gp; 重量 23 磅

  For those brave enough to match wits with draconic intellects, this kit can help a dragonslayer sneak into or out of a dragon's lair or trick a dragon should the interloper be discovered.

  It includes a pot of alchemical grease, a board game, five candles, a candle lamp, a 普通 snorkel, fake footprint shoes, a grappling hook, a mirror, a periscope, a potion of eagle's splendor, two sacks, a scent cloak, 50 feet of silk rope, a smokestick, a dose of sneezing powder, five tindertwigs, and 50 feet of twine.

Kit, Troll Slayer's.name: 巨魔杀手工具箱（kit, Troll slayer's）
Kit, Troll Slayer's.description:
价格： 30金币， 重量： 17磅。

  该工具箱包括一瓶炽火胶，一瓶强酸，十根火把，一盒火柴和五瓶灯油。

Kit, Undead Slayer's.name: 亡灵杀手工具箱（kit, Undead slayer's）
Kit, Undead Slayer's.description:
价格： 402金币; 重量： 7磅。

  该工具箱包括一个木制圣徽，一根蒜头项链，一把锤子，一个木桩，两瓶圣水，一根照明杖，一瓶次级复原书药水和一瓶防护邪恶。

Kit, Undeath Aid.name: Kit, Undeath Aid（Kit, Undeath Aid）
Kit, Undeath Aid.description:
Source: USH

  价格 500 gp; 重量 1/2 磅

  This small leather satchel contains various alchemical remedies that treat 普通 maladies caused by exposure to undead. An undeath aid kit contains 1 dose of each of the following alchemical remedies: antiplague, antitoxin, padzahr, soul stimulant, and twitch tonic.

Kit, Vampire Slayer's.name: Kit, Vampire Slayer's（Kit, Vampire Slayer's）
Kit, Vampire Slayer's.description: This small, latched wooden case contains numerous tools and devices used in hunting and slaying vampires. It contains 10 cloves of garlic, four masterwork wooden stakes, a hammer, a silvered mirror, 4 vials of holy water, 1 application of silversheen, and a masterwork holy symbol. It also contains numerous regents and powders used for treating wounds and making wards, salves, and other concoctions. In addition to its general usefulness, when displayed, a vampire slayer’s kit grants its owner a +2 bonus on all Charisma-based skill checks made to investigate or seek out vampires.

Kit, Veterinarian's.name: 兽医工具包（Kit, Veterinarian's）
Kit, Veterinarian's.description:
价格：25GP；重量：1磅

  这包医疗用品和医疗包类似，不过它更适合用来治疗常见的家畜（猫狗，牛羊之类），它可以在你对动物使用的医疗技能检定上提供+3环境加值，但如果对人使用就只能+1。一件兽医工具包可以使用10次。

Kit, Warpriest's.name: 战斗祭司工具包（Kit, Warpriest's）
Kit, Warpriest's.description:
价格：16gp；重量：31磅

  这套工具包包含1个背包（Kit, backpack）、1个铺盖卷（bedroll）、1个腰包（belt pouch）、1本便宜的教典（cheap holy text）、1份燧石和铁片（flint and steel）、1个铁壶（iron pot）、1套餐具（mess kit）、1根麻绳（rope）、1块肥皂（soap）、1个法术材料包（spell component pouch）、10根火把（torches）、5天份的干粮（trail rations）、1个水袋（waterskin）以及1个木制圣徽（wooden holy symbol）。

Kit, Watchman's.name: Kit, Watchman's（Kit, Watchman's）
Kit, Watchman's.description:
价格 3 gp; 重量 10 磅

  This kit includes a badge (tin brooch worth 5 sp), flint and steel, a shield sconce, a signal whistle, and torches (10).

Kit, Witch's.name: 女巫工具包（kit, Witch's）
Kit, Witch's.description:
价格： 21金币; 重量： 21磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，蜡烛（10），粉笔（10），火石燧石和铁片，墨水，一支墨水笔，铁壶，一套餐具，肥皂，一个施法材料包，火把（ 10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。

Kit, Wizard's.name: 法师工具包（kit, Wizard's）
Kit, Wizard's.description:
价格： 21金币; 重量： 21磅。

  该工具包包括一个背包，一个铺盖卷，一个腰包，燧石和铁片，墨水，一支墨水笔，铁壶，一套餐具，肥皂，一个施法材料包，火把（10），口粮（5天）和一个水袋。工具包不包含魔法书，因为法师在游戏起始时就有一本法术书，并不需要购买一个。

Kit, Zombie Slayer's.name: Kit, Zombie Slayer's（Kit, Zombie Slayer's）
Kit, Zombie Slayer's.description:
Source: USH

  价格 170 gp; 重量 31 磅

  This large satchel contains the tools needed to put down potential zombie uprisings. The kit includes a shovel, two flasks of oil, a bullseye lantern, a flask of alchemist's fire, two flasks of holy water, 50 feet of hemp rope, a crowbar, a hammer and 10 nails, two vials of antiplague, and a wooden holy symbol.

Kumis.name: 马奶酒（Kumis）
Kumis.description:
价格：5SP；重量：1又1/2磅

  正如其名，这种酒是用发酵的马奶酿成的，它的烈度和啤酒差不多。马奶酒通常冷饮。

Lab, Alchemist's.name: Lab, Alchemist's（Lab, Alchemist's）
Lab, Alchemist's.description:
价格 200 gp; 重量 40 磅

  This lab is used for making alchemical items, and provides a +2 circumstance bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks. It has no bearing on the costs related to the Craft (alchemy) skill. Without this lab, a character with the Craft (alchemy) skill is assumed to have enough tools to use the skill but not enough to get the +2 bonus that the lab provides.

  • Portable alchemist's lab: This compact version of a full-sized alchemist's lab provides a +1 circumstance bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks.

  Portable alchemist's lab 价格 75 gp; 重量 20 磅

  Other Alchemical Tools

Source: PZO9445

  • Crucible 价格 20 gp; 重量 30 磅 描述 A crucible is a type of vessel that can be heated to extreme temperatures for the purpose of inducing special alchemical reactions. A portable crucible is a cylinder 12 inches tall and 18 inches in diameter that weighs 3 pounds; it has the same price as a full-sized crucible. Use of a crucible requires a heat source.
  • Filter 价格 5 sp; 重量 1/2 磅 描述 A specialized paper filter is used in alchemy because it can be adjusted to capture different substances according to the type of reagents used to prime it. Alchemical filters are single-use only.
  • Retort 价格 2 gp; 重量 1/2 磅 描述 A retort is a pair of flasks attached to one another by a bent connector called an alembic. When one flask is heated, gaseous products pass through the alembic and condense in the other flask.

Ladder, Folding.name: 折叠梯（Ladder, Folding）
Ladder, Folding.description:
Ladder, Folding

  价格 2 gp; 重量 16 磅

  挂钩、长杆、梯级以铰链连接，组成了这个10尺长的梯子，你可以将其折叠为3英尺x1英尺x1英尺的大小。展开或折叠梯子是一个标准动作。.

Lamp.name: 油灯（Lamp）
Lamp.description:
Lamp

Source PZO1110

  价格 1 sp; 重量 1 磅

  普通的油灯只能照亮一小块区域，在15英尺半径范围内提供普通光照，并提升该区域之后15尺范围内的光照水平一级（黑暗变为昏暗，昏暗变为正常）。普通油灯不能提升正常光照或明亮光照水平。1品脱油可供燃烧6小时。你可以单手提着普通油灯。

Lamp, Celestial.name: Lamp, Celestial（Lamp, Celestial）
Lamp, Celestial.description:
Lamp, Celestial

Source PZO1121

  This polished lantern contains a continual flame and sheds light as a 普通 lamp. If its font of consecrated crystal and metalwork is filled with holy water, the lamp's light is sanctified for 24 hours, adding a +1 bonus to the save DC of channeled positive energy or energy channeled to harm evil outsiders within a 30-foot radius.

Lantern.name: 提灯（Lantern）
Lantern.description:
Lantern

  牛眼提灯 牛眼提灯提供60尺锥形范围的正常照明，并使之后120尺锥形范围的光照程度提升一级（黑暗变为昏暗，昏暗变为正常）。牛眼提灯无法提升正常光照及明亮光照的光照水平。牛眼提灯每6小时消耗1品脱灯油。你可以单手握持牛眼提灯。 价格 12 gp; 重量 3 磅

  黑光提灯 这盏提灯不烧灯油，但是需要燃烧影脂（见后文）。当其以影脂为燃料，提灯会创造一片古怪的黑暗阴霾，在其周围30尺范围内的光照等级（light level）会降低一级（核心 172页）。与被影脂命中的单一目标不同，这片阴霾不会将自然黑暗变为超自然黑暗。一瓶影脂可供一盏黑光提灯使用1分钟。

  附盖提灯 附盖提灯提供半径30尺圆形范围的普通光照，并提升该区域之后30尺范围内的光照水平一级（黑暗变为昏暗，昏暗变为正常）。附盖提灯不能提升正常光照或明亮光照的光照的光照水平。1品脱油可供燃烧6小时。你可以单手提着提灯。 价格 7 gp; 重量 2 磅

  矿工提灯 牛眼提灯的小号版本，矿工提灯可以在30尺锥形范围内提供普通光照，超出该范围并延申至60尺锥形范围的区域光照水平提升一级（黑暗变为昏暗，昏暗变为正常）。矿工提灯在普通光照或明亮光照中并不会提升光照水平。一品脱灯油可以供他燃烧6个小时。矿工提灯上有皮带用以固定在头盔或别的坚固头部装备上，但它也能被单手持用。 Source PCS:PSFG

  防水提灯 在判定风是否能熄灭火焰时，防水提灯可以视烈风为强风，视暴风为烈风，视飓风为暴风，这意味着防水提灯不仅能从风中也能从水中保护其火焰。在熄灭前，内部保存的空气可供它在水下燃烧5轮。 价格 +5 gp; 重量 -

Leechwort.name: Leechwort（Leechwort）
Leechwort.description:
Source PZO1140

  价格 3 gp

  When dried and ground into a powder, the mottled red-and-gray bark of this shrub is a boon to healers. Gather DC 16; Yield 1d4 doses

  Terrain warm forests or swamps

  Preparation Properly preparing leechwort for use is a time-consuming process that takes 1 week, as fibers of the shrub must be dried and ground until they achieve a fine, powdery texture. A single herbalist can prepare up to a dozen doses simultaneously in this manner. At the end of the week, a successful DC 15 Craft (alchemy) check results in all of the doses being ready for use; failure indicates that all the doses have spoiled.

  Use When a dose of prepared leechwort is used in conjunction with a Heal check to stabilize a dying creature, provide long-term care, treat wounds from caltrops (or similar effects), or treat deadly wounds, it grants a +1 alchemical bonus on the Heal check. This increases to a +2 alchemical bonus on Heal checks to staunch bleeding.

Lichen, Camouflage.name: Lichen, Camouflage（Lichen, Camouflage）
Lichen, Camouflage.description:
Source PZO1121

  Though oreads with obviously stony features are rare, almost all oreads have an essentially earthen quality to their skin that makes it perfect for cultivating plant life. Where other races would be appalled at the thought of plants taking root in their flesh, oreads see it as a natural and healthy extension of their elemental nature. For this reason, oread herbalists developed several strains of moss and lichen specifically adapted to grow on their bodies. Camouflage lichen is the most 普通 variety of these oread plants. It takes 1 minute to apply a paste of camouflage lichen spores to the skin, and an additional 24 hours for the fungus to sprout. After this time, the oread is covered in a thin green layer of living plant matter, granting her a +4 bonus on Stealth checks made in green forest and jungle environments. Red-orange and white varieties exist, providing bonuses in appropriately colored environments (red-orange among autumn leaves or in red deserts, white in snow, and so on). Camouflage lichen has a short lifespan; it withers and dies 3 days after being applied, crumbling away into harmless powder. This item only works on oreads and other creatures with rock-like bodies.

Light Detector.name: 感光板（Light Detector）
Light Detector.description:
价格：1GP重量：-

  这块巴掌大小的小铁片涂有一层光敏性的特殊透明涂料，如果暴露在亮光下，涂料就会迅速变黑，失去透明度。根据光亮的强度，明亮的光线可以在1轮内将感光板完全变黑，普通光亮需要3轮，而昏暗亮度则是10轮。感光板经常被拥有黑暗视觉的生物用来监测是否有携带光源的生物通过放置它的区域。在保存时，感光板需要用厚实避光的材料完好的包裹以免接触光线。

Liquid Ice.name: 冻结剂（Liquid Ice）
Liquid Ice.description:
价格：40G；重量：2磅

  冻结剂也被称为“炼金术士之冰”，这种密封瓶中装满了一种如同水晶一般的蓝色液体，在打开瓶子的一瞬间，冻结剂便会发出呲呲的声音并开始缓慢蒸发。打开瓶口后，在冻结剂完全蒸发之前的1D6轮之内，你可以用其冻结液体，或者给物品镀上一层薄冰。你也可以将冻结剂做为一种溅射武器投掷。直接命中会对目标生物造成1D6的寒冷伤害，并对目标生物5尺范围内的生物造成1点寒冷的溅射伤害。

  制造冻结剂需要一个DC25的工艺（炼金）检定。

Lock.name: 锁（Lock）
Lock.description:
Source: PZO1110

  这种锁可以是挂锁，嵌于门上或箱子内的锁，或任何其他类型的钥匙锁。使用解除装置打开一把锁的DC取决于锁的质量：简单（DC20），普通（DC25），精良（DC 30），优质（DC 40）。

Locket, Poisoned.name: Locket, Poisoned（Locket, Poisoned）
Locket, Poisoned.description:
Source PPC:P&P

  价格 75 gp; 重量 -

  This heart-shaped locket is attached to a thin metal chain made of looped strands of gold or silver. Inside the locket is a small, spring-loaded vial that can hold a single dose of powdered poison. Loading the locket with poison carries the same risks as applying poison to a weapon. When the locket is opened, the vial is shattered by a ball bearing, releasing the powder into the air and treating the poison's type as if it were inhaled. The airborne poison affects all creatures within 10 feet of the locket.

Love-In-Idleness.name: Love-In-Idleness（Love-In-Idleness）
Love-In-Idleness.description:
Source PZO1140

  价格 150 gp

  The deep-red flower has rich nectar with a honey-like scent.

  Gather DC 20; Yield 1 dose

  Terrain any forests

  Preparation A dose of this flower's nectar must be extracted and stored in an alchemically prepared vial with a successful DC 14 Craft (alchemy) check and 1 hour's worth of work.

  Use As a full-round action, a dose of love-in-idleness nectar can be drizzled into the ears of a helpless or willing animal or humanoid. This causes the subject to become much more susceptible to the power of suggestion and mind-affecting effects, taking a -2 penalty on Sense Motive checks and a -1 penalty on saving throws against mind-affecting effects for the next 2d4 hours. This is a poison effect.

Lure, Fake Area Map.name: Lure, Fake Area Map（Lure, Fake Area Map）
Lure, Fake Area Map.description:
价格 20 gp; 重量 -

  This faux-distressed piece of parchment is a crude map of the local area, with red circles and arcane gibberish scrawled on it. Intentionally made to look old and worn, it's actually a simple piece of parchment that's been singed, crumpled, and rolled in the dirt. Because the average kobold artisan's knowledge of Common is poor, any literate creature within 5 feet can identify the map as a fake. However, beyond 5 feet, a fake map requires a successful DC 25 Sense Motive check to identify it as phony.

Lure, Fake Coins

  价格 5 gp; 重量 -

  These rough-hewn discs of metal are covered in highly reflective, gold-colored plating, which catches the light and causes them to shimmer. At a distance greater than 5 feet, fake coins require a DC 20 Sense Motive check to identify. However, because these "coins" aren't molded and have no embellishment on either side, any creature within 5 feet can clearly identify them as spurious.

Heretic's Fork

Source: PZO1135

  价格 10 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  This device is a sharp, double-ended prong that is approximately 9 inches in length and fitted with a stout leather neckband. This nefarious device is secured on a helpless target's neck so the prongs pierce both the underside of the victim's chin and the victim's chest, dealing 1d6 points of nonlethal damage when the device is attached and an additional 1d6 points of nonlethal damage if the victim begins to fall asleep, effectively keeping the victim awake indefinitely and subjecting the victim to fatigue and exhaustion through sleep deprivation. A successful DC 22 Escape Artist check allows the victim to get free of the prongs without using his arms, though the heretic's fork remains strapped to his neck.

Iron Maiden

Source: PZO1135

  价格 500 gp; 重量 300 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  These dreadful devices are large, stylized iron coffins lined with sharp spikes used to torture and execute unfortunate victims.

  When a Small or Medium creature is forced within the iron maiden and the spiked doors are slammed shut, the creature is impaled on all sides by the iron spikes, immediately taking 3d6 points of piercing damage.

Rack

Source: PZO1135

  价格 300 gp; 重量 500 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  The rack is one of the most infamous and feared devices in the torturer's arsenal, capable of inflicting ruinous damage to a victim's body. Helpless victims are splayed across the device's frame, and each limb is lashed to a central windlass. Each turn of the crank deals a cumulative 1d6 points of nonlethal damage, up to 4d6 points of nonlethal damage on the fourth turn. Each subsequent turn after the fourth deals 4d6 points of nonlethal damage and deals 1 point of damage each to the victim's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution scores as it dislocates limbs, cracks cartilage, and breaks bone. Some racks are fitted with spiked wheels that puncture the victim's body, dealing lethal damage rather than nonlethal damage. Escaping from a rack requires a successful DC 30 Escape Artist check.

Rat Cage

Source: PZO1135

  价格 5 gp; 重量 15 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  This specially crafted steel cage can hold up to 20 rats, and includes stout leather straps around its open end and a metal crucible for holding hot charcoal or other fuel on its top end. Torturers tightly strap the open end of the device to a helpless victim's abdomen, insert the rats into the cage, and set the crucible's fuel alight. In 1d10 rounds, the increasing heat causes the rats to gnaw and dig their way through the victim's abdomen to escape, dealing 1 point of piercing damage per rat each round. A victim can wiggle free of a rat cage with a successful DC 20 Escape Artist check, though some of the voracious vermin may continue their consumption in subsequent rounds.

Thumbscrew

Source: PZO1135

  Common 价格 15 gp; 重量 1 磅; Masterwork 价格 50 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  Both a torture and restraining device, this small, metal armature consists of two parallel, spike-studded bars that close together as the user tightens the frame's screws, crushing a victim's thumbs between them. A victim restrained by a thumbscrew is able to move but can't effectively wield weapons, hold items, or perform any actions or skill checks that require manual dexterity, taking a -5 penalty on all such actions and dealing 1d6 points of nonlethal damage to himself with each attempt (this doesn't include Escape Artist attempts to escape the thumbscrew).

  Spellcasters bound by thumbscrews are unable to cast spells with somatic components.

  When using a thumbscrew as a torture device, the user can turn the thumbscrew's bolt to deal 1d6 points of nonlethal damage.

  Escaping from a thumbscrew requires a successful DC 28 Escape Artist check (DC 30 for a masterwork thumbscrew).

Trephine

Source: PZO1135

  价格 20 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  This surgical instrument has a serrated, circular blade that is used to bore holes into the skulls of patients to relieve cranial swelling from head trauma or, as some chirurgeons believe, release evil spirits. Use of a trephine takes 10 minutes, and deals 5 points of piercing damage to the subject creature. With a successful DC 25 Heal check, the user can heal up to 1d4 points of ability damage to any one mental ability score caused by physical trauma to the head, such as the critical called shot or debilitating blow called shot, or it can cure the severe brain trauma inflicted by the debilitating blow called shot. If the user fails the check, the subject still takes 5 points of piercing damage. If the user fails the check by 5 or more, the subject instead takes 10 points of piercing damage and 1 point of damage each to its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

Lure, Fake Coins.name: Lure, Fake Coins（Lure, Fake Coins）
Lure, Fake Coins.description:
价格 5 gp; 重量 -

  These rough-hewn discs of metal are covered in highly reflective, gold-colored plating, which catches the light and causes them to shimmer. At a distance greater than 5 feet, fake coins require a DC 20 Sense Motive check to identify. However, because these "coins" aren't molded and have no embellishment on either side, any creature within 5 feet can clearly identify them as spurious.

Heretic's Fork

Source: PZO1135

  价格 10 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  This device is a sharp, double-ended prong that is approximately 9 inches in length and fitted with a stout leather neckband. This nefarious device is secured on a helpless target's neck so the prongs pierce both the underside of the victim's chin and the victim's chest, dealing 1d6 points of nonlethal damage when the device is attached and an additional 1d6 points of nonlethal damage if the victim begins to fall asleep, effectively keeping the victim awake indefinitely and subjecting the victim to fatigue and exhaustion through sleep deprivation. A successful DC 22 Escape Artist check allows the victim to get free of the prongs without using his arms, though the heretic's fork remains strapped to his neck.

Iron Maiden

Source: PZO1135

  价格 500 gp; 重量 300 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  These dreadful devices are large, stylized iron coffins lined with sharp spikes used to torture and execute unfortunate victims.

  When a Small or Medium creature is forced within the iron maiden and the spiked doors are slammed shut, the creature is impaled on all sides by the iron spikes, immediately taking 3d6 points of piercing damage.

Rack

Source: PZO1135

  价格 300 gp; 重量 500 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  The rack is one of the most infamous and feared devices in the torturer's arsenal, capable of inflicting ruinous damage to a victim's body. Helpless victims are splayed across the device's frame, and each limb is lashed to a central windlass. Each turn of the crank deals a cumulative 1d6 points of nonlethal damage, up to 4d6 points of nonlethal damage on the fourth turn. Each subsequent turn after the fourth deals 4d6 points of nonlethal damage and deals 1 point of damage each to the victim's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution scores as it dislocates limbs, cracks cartilage, and breaks bone. Some racks are fitted with spiked wheels that puncture the victim's body, dealing lethal damage rather than nonlethal damage. Escaping from a rack requires a successful DC 30 Escape Artist check.

Rat Cage

Source: PZO1135

  价格 5 gp; 重量 15 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

  This specially crafted steel cage can hold up to 20 rats, and includes stout leather straps around its open end and a metal crucible for holding hot charcoal or other fuel on its top end. Torturers tightly strap the open end of the device to a helpless victim's abdomen, insert the rats into the cage, and set the crucible's fuel alight. In 1d10 rounds, the increasing heat causes the rats to gnaw and dig their way through the victim's abdomen to escape, dealing 1 point of piercing damage per rat each round. A victim can wiggle free of a rat cage with a successful DC 20 Escape Artist check, though some of the voracious vermin may continue their consumption in subsequent rounds.

Thumbscrew

Source: PZO1135

  Common 价格 15 gp; 重量 1 磅; Masterwork 价格 50 gp; 重量 1 磅

  When using a thumbscrew as a torture device, the user can turn the thumbscrew's bolt to deal 1d6 points of nonlethal damage.

  Escaping from a thumbscrew requires a successful DC 28 Escape Artist check (DC 30 for a masterwork thumbscrew).

Source: PZO1135

  价格 20 gp; 重量 1 磅

  Note Each act of torture shifts the torturer's alignment one step toward evil, and it counts as a willful evil act for the purpose of effects like atonement.

Use of a trephine takes 10 minutes, and deals 5 points of piercing damage to the subject creature. If the user fails the check, the subject still takes 5 points of piercing damage. If the user fails the check by 5 or more, the subject instead takes 10 points of piercing damage and 1 point of damage each to its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

Magnesium.name: Magnesium（Magnesium）
Magnesium.description:
Source PZO9445

  价格 1 gp; 重量 -

  Magnesium is an extremely light and reactive metal that burns brightly when exposed to air. It is important for all living things, especially plants.

Alchemical Power Component

  Doses 2 (2 gp); Spells transmutation school

  Spells of the transmutation school are cast at +1 caster level for the purpose of determining duration.

Magnet.name: Magnet（Magnet）
Magnet.description:
Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 57, Advanced Player's Guide pg. 181, Adventurer's Armory pg. 19
价格 5 sp; 重量 1/2 磅
分类 冒险装备

描述

  Handheld magnets are relatively weak and are mainly used to detect or pull iron, 秘银, or 精金 at a short range. They are not powerful enough to tug metal over significant distances or aid in disarming creatures wielding metal weapons. This hand-sized horseshoe magnet can lift up to a 3-pound iron weight.

Manacle Barbs.name: Manacle Barbs（Manacle Barbs）
Manacle Barbs.description:
Source: PZO1121

  Barbs added to these manacles wound a captive who does more than move slowly and with care. A creature secured in barbed manacles takes 1 point of piercing damage if it takes more than a single move action during a round. Rough movement of any kind, such as being struck in combat or falling prone, likewise causes 1 point of damage. Attempting to break out of barbed manacles with a Strength check deals 1d4 points of piercing damage to the captive regardless of the success of the attempt.

  Fetters can also be fitted with barbs, but the wearer can avoid damage by not taking actions that involve moving its legs. Hobgoblins often use such fetters to secure artisans to their worktables. Securing a captive with multiple sets of manacles and/or fetters doesn't cause additional damage.

  

  Tool Kits

  This section includes several kits of preselected gear for each character class or for specific adventuring purposes (dungeoneering, spelunking, and so on). GMs can use these kits to quickly round out an NPC's gear. Players can use them to equip new PCs in a hurry or as a shorthand for providing gear for cohorts, followers, minions, and hirelings. The listed price for the kit includes a small discount for purchasing these items as a group. Items in a kit that are used up, destroyed, or lost cost the full price to replace.

Manacles, Common.name: 镣铐（Manacles, Common）
Manacles, Common.description:
Source: PZO1110

  镣铐可以铐住一个中等体型的生物。被铐住的生物可以使用脱逃进行挣脱（DC30，精制镣铐则为35）。打破镣铐需要一个力量检定（DC 26，精制镣铐则为28）。镣铐硬度为10，并有10点的生命值。

  大多数镣铐都有锁；把你想要用在镣铐上的锁的价格记入镣铐的价格。

  你可以以相同的价格购买适用于小体型生物的镣铐。对于大型生物而言，镣铐的价格为标示金额的10倍；超大型的生物则是标示金额的100倍。巨型，超巨型，超小型，微型和超微型的生物可以被特别定制的镣铐所铐住，这种镣铐的花费需要至少100倍的价格。

  Expanded Information

Source: PZO9293

  Fetters: These manacles are specifically designed to fit around the ankles, and use the same rules for breaking, escape, and cost relative to size. A creature in fetters is entangled and can move at only half speed. In addition, a fettered creature must succeed at a DC 15 Acrobatics check to move more than its (reduced) speed in a round. If it fails the check by 5 or more, the creature falls prone.

  Frontal Restraint: A creature whose wrists are bound with manacles can wield only one melee weapon or shield in combat (the weapon may be a two-handed weapon). It cannot make use of ranged weapons, except for crossbows (but even these cannot be reloaded by the bound creature). Any attack the creature makes while manacled takes a -4 penalty. The creature can attempt skill checks using its hands, but at a -5 penalty (-15 on Disable Device checks to pick the lock of manacles the creature is wearing).

  Rear Restraint: Manacles might be employed to keep a creature's hands behind its back. In such cases, the creature cannot use its hands to effectively employ any weapon or shield. The creature can attempt to use its hands to perform a skill, but at a -10 penalty (-25 on Disable Device checks to pick the lock of manacles the creature is wearing). While manacled, a creature can attempt to flip its arms beneath its legs, bringing its hands in front of itself. This requires a successful DC 25 Escape Artist check (a separate Escape Artist check is then required to escape the manacles).

  Restraining Two Individuals: Two creatures might share one set of manacles. While manacled together, the manacled individuals must remain adjacent to one another. If they are not working together, they are both treated as grappled. If they are working together, they can move together in the same round (using the movement speed of the slower creature). A manacled creature can forfeit its turn during combat to mimic the other manacled creature's movements, allowing that creature to act as if unrestrained.

Manacles, Masterwork.name: 精制镣铐（Manacles, Masterwork）
Manacles, Masterwork.description:
Source: PZO1110

  镣铐可以铐住一个中等体型的生物。被铐住的生物可以使用脱逃进行挣脱（DC30，精制镣铐则为35）。打破镣铐需要一个力量检定（DC 26，精制镣铐则为28）。镣铐硬度为10，并有10点的生命值。

  大多数镣铐都有锁；把你想要用在镣铐上的锁的价格记入镣铐的价格。

  你可以以相同的价格购买适用于小体型生物的镣铐。对于大型生物而言，镣铐的价格为标示金额的10倍；超大型的生物则是标示金额的100倍。巨型，超巨型，超小型，微型和超微型的生物可以被特别定制的镣铐所铐住，这种镣铐的花费需要至少100倍的价格。

If it fails the check by 5 or more, the creature falls prone.

It cannot make use of ranged weapons, except for crossbows (but even these cannot be reloaded by the bound creature). Any attack the creature makes while manacled takes a -4 penalty. The creature can attempt skill checks using its hands, but at a -5 penalty (-15 on Disable Device checks to pick the lock of manacles the creature is wearing).

  Rear Restraint: Manacles might be employed to keep a creature's hands behind its back. In such cases, the creature cannot use its hands to effectively employ any weapon or shield. The creature can attempt to use its hands to perform a skill, but at a -10 penalty (-25 on Disable Device checks to pick the lock of manacles the creature is wearing). This requires a successful DC 25 Escape Artist check (a separate Escape Artist check is then required to escape the manacles).
